Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.solar_panel.mil

MIL models of the solar panel.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SolarPanelSimulationConfigurationI
    The interface SolarPanelSimulationConfigurationI defines configuration parameters for the solar panel simulator.
    SunIntensityModelI
    The class SunIntensityModelI defines common constants and signatures for sun intensity simulation models.
    SunRiseAndSetModelI
    The class SunRiseAndSetModelI defines common constants and signatures for sunrise and sunset simulation models.
    SunStateManagementI
    The interface SunStateManagementI defines common signatures to set the sun state and the current time on solar panel simulation models.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel
    The class AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel models the sunrises and sunsets as events which times of occurrence are computed from actual positions on earth and actual days.
    DeterministicSunIntensityModel
    The class DeterministicSunIntensityModel Description This simulation model provides a sun intensity coefficient in [0, 1] as the result of a sine from 0 to Math.PI from sunrise to sunset.
    DeterministicSunRiseAndSetModel
    The class DeterministicSunRiseAndSetModel Description This simulation model provides the sunrises and sunsets hours as fixed constants during the whole simulation but can be changed from simulations to simulations.
    RunSolarPanelUnitaryMILSimulation
    The class RunSolarPanelUnitaryMILSimulation is the main class used to run simulations on the example models of the solar panel in isolation.
    SolarPanelCoupledModel
    The class SolarPanelCoupledModel defines the coupled model for the solar panel DEVS simulator.
    SolarPanelPowerModel
    The class SolarPanelPowerModel implements the simulation model that computes the current power production of the solar panel.
    StochasticSunIntensityModel
    The class StochasticSunIntensityModel implements the simulation model that computes the intensity of the sun, including the cloud transparency using stochastic parameters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SunState
    The enumeration SunState defines the day light state, day or night.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.solar_panel.mil Description

MIL models of the solar panel.

This package defines the MIL simulation models for the solar panel.
